20 using System;
21 using System.Reflection;
22 using UnityEngine;
23 
24 namespace FullInspector.Internal {
28  public sealed class InspectedProperty {
32  public MemberInfo MemberInfo {
33  get;
34  private set;
35  }
36 
40  public string Name;
41 
45  public bool IsPublic {
46  get {
47  if (_isPublicCache == null) {
48  FieldInfo field = MemberInfo as FieldInfo;
49  if (field != null) {
50  _isPublicCache = field.IsPublic;
51  }
52 
53  PropertyInfo property = MemberInfo as PropertyInfo;
54  if (property != null) {
55  _isPublicCache = property.GetGetMethod() != null ||
56  property.GetSetMethod() != null;
57  }
58 
59  if (_isPublicCache.HasValue == false) {
60  _isPublicCache = false;
61  }
62  }
63 
64  return _isPublicCache.Value;
65  }
66  }
67  private bool? _isPublicCache;
68 
73  public void Write(object context, object value) {
74  try {
75  FieldInfo field = MemberInfo as FieldInfo;
76  PropertyInfo property = MemberInfo as PropertyInfo;
77 
78  if (field != null) {
79  field.SetValue(context, value);
80  }
81 
82  else if (property != null) {
83  MethodInfo setMethod = property.GetSetMethod(/*nonPublic:*/ true);
84  if (setMethod != null) {
85  setMethod.Invoke(context, new object[] { value });
86  }
87  }
88  }
89 
90  catch (Exception e) {
91  if (FullInspectorSettings.EmitWarnings) {
92  Debug.LogWarning("Caught exception when writing property " + this +
93  " with context=" + context + " and value=" + value + "\nException: " + e);
94  }
95  }
96  }
97 
102  public object Read(object context) {
103  try {
104  if (MemberInfo is PropertyInfo) {
105  return ((PropertyInfo)MemberInfo).GetValue(context, new object[] { });
106  }
107 
108  else {
109  return ((FieldInfo)MemberInfo).GetValue(context);
110  }
111  }
112  catch (Exception e) {
113  if (FullInspectorSettings.EmitWarnings) {
114  Debug.LogWarning("Caught exception when reading property " + this + " with " +
115  " context=" + context + "; returning null\nException:" + e);
116  }
117  return null;
118  }
119  }
120 
125  public Type StorageType;
126 
130  public InspectedProperty(PropertyInfo property) {
131  MemberInfo = property;
132  Name = property.Name;
133  StorageType = property.PropertyType;
134  }
135 
139  public InspectedProperty(FieldInfo field) {
140  MemberInfo = field;
141  Name = field.Name;
142  StorageType = field.FieldType;
143  }
144 
148  public override bool Equals(System.Object obj) {
149  // If parameter is null return false.
150  if (obj == null) {
151  return false;
152  }
153 
154  // If parameter cannot be cast to PropertyMetadata return false.
155  InspectedProperty p = obj as InspectedProperty;
156  if ((System.Object)p == null) {
157  return false;
158  }
159 
160  // Return true if the fields match:
161  return (StorageType == p.StorageType) && (Name == p.Name);
162  }
163 
167  public bool Equals(InspectedProperty p) {
168  // If parameter is null return false:
169  if ((object)p == null) {
170  return false;
171  }
172 
173  // Return true if the fields match:
174  return (StorageType == p.StorageType) && (Name == p.Name);
175  }
176 
182  public override int GetHashCode() {
183  return StorageType.GetHashCode() ^ Name.GetHashCode();
184  }
185  }
186 }

FullInspector.Internal.InspectedProperty.StorageType
Type StorageType
The type of value that is stored inside of the property. For example, for an int field, StorageType will be typeof(int).
Definition: InspectedProperty.cs:125
